base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with four drawers.
part_description: Four horizontal drawers, evenly stacked, with handles centered on each. Rectangular shape, uniform size, positioned front-facing.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides horizontally within the cabinet frame, supported by internal tracks. The handles allow for easy pulling and pushing of the drawers, facilitating smooth operation.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against walls or in corners, used for storage by people. Drawers are accessed by pulling handles, and the flat top surface can support additional items.
